meanings.definition: In a manner related to the property of certain crystals to generate an electric charge in response to mechanical stress.
meanings.sent1: The crystal glowed piezoelectrically when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The sensor reacted piezoelectrically to the slightest touch.
meanings.sent3: The crystal danced piezoelectrically when tapped lightly.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like a piezoelectrically charged crystal, ready to spark at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The music resonated piezoelectrically through the crystal, creating a beautiful light show.

meanings.definition: Using the property of certain materials to produce an electric charge when subjected to mechanical pressure.
meanings.sent1: The piezoelectrically powered device lit up with a touch.
meanings.sent2: The piezoelectrically charged material was used in the new invention.
meanings.sent3: The piezoelectrically active substance seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a piezoelectrically charged battery.
meanings.sent5: The piezoelectrically responsive material transformed the industry with its efficiency.
